Title: 39009 - # Ways Bluetooth Has Changed the World of Communication
Direction: 675 words. Write about four to eight ways Bluetooth has changed how people communicate. The Bluetooth standard for wireless communication creates crystal clear and rock solid connections with cell phones, wristwatches, in-dash navigation systems and more. It extended the usefulness of the smartphone by enabling it to send data over a distance to another device. Talk about the devices that use Bluetooth and why it makes the products better. Consider anchoring the client URL to a sentence that discusses Bluetooth headphones from the client. Your target audience is interested in technology.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: such as Bluetooth headphones from T-Mobile
